document_notes.text:
This update for openexr fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2020-16587: Fixed a heap-based buffer overflow in chunkOffsetReconstruction in ImfMultiPartInputFile.cpp (bsc#1179879).
- CVE-2020-16588: Fixed a null pointer deference in generatePreview (bsc#1179879).
- CVE-2020-16589: Fixed a heap-based buffer overflow in writeTileData in ImfTiledOutputFile.cpp (bsc#1179879).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in Academy Software Foundation OpenEXR 2.3.0 in chunkOffsetReconstruction in ImfMultiPartInputFile.cpp that can cause a denial of service via a crafted EXR file.

notes.text: A Null Pointer Deference issue exists in Academy Software Foundation OpenEXR 2.3.0 in generatePreview in makePreview.cpp that can cause a denial of service via a crafted EXR file.
